title: Structured Reflection and Practice-Based Education for Computer-Mediated Communication (CMC) Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital communication experience and understanding of professional (medical/legal/technical) workflows
context.additional_context: Offline training for medical/legal/technical professionals in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the characteristics of various CMC tools (chat, video conferencing, etc.) and select appropriate communication strategies for specific contexts
Learners can recognize and improve cultural/contextual differences in online interactions through structured reflective journaling
Learners can apply profession-specific CMC skills (business negotiation techniques, patient/client communication, etc.) through role-playing based on practical scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
